seed_pair.known: 我知道下周我需要做什么。
seed_pair.target: I know how to do what I need to do next week.

S0049: 就是这样，如果你知道我的意思的话。
It's like this, if you know what I mean.
if you know what I mean
如果你知道我的意思的话
S0050: 我不是在试着尽快完成。
I'm not trying to finish as quickly as possible.
to finish as quickly as possible
S0051: 我喜欢和朋友做有趣的事情。
I enjoy doing interesting things with my friends.
S0052: 他上周想给他的朋友写封信。
He wanted to write a letter to his friend last week.
S0053: 她想把他的信放进她的包里。
She wanted to put his letter in her bag.
put his letter in her bag
把他的信放进她的包里
S0054: 我们想多给你一点时间。
We wanted to give you a little more time.
give you a little more time
S0055: 当我没睡好的时候我不喜欢醒来。
I don't enjoy waking up when I didn't sleep very well.
when I didn't sleep very well
S0056: 这样我就能记住怎么说几个词。
So I can remember how to say a few words.
S0057: 我记不住怎么说我想说的话。
I can't remember how to say what I wanted to say.
what to say / wanted to say
S0058: 当你理解足够多的词的时候很有趣。
It's interesting when you understand enough words.
当你理解足够多的词的时候

practice_phrases: I know.
我知道。
I know a few words.
我知道几个词。
I know it's like this.
我知道就是这样。
I know how to say it.
我知道怎么说。
I know what to say next week.
我知道下周说什么。
I know how to do interesting things.
我知道怎么做有趣的事情。
I know how to say a few words to my friends.
我知道怎么对朋友说几个词。
I know how to do interesting things with my friends last week.
我知道上周怎么和朋友做有趣的事情。
Because I think I know, I enjoy doing interesting things.
因为我认为我知道，我喜欢做有趣的事情。
I know how to say what I wanted to say when I didn't sleep well.
当我没睡好的时候我知道怎么说我想说的话。

seed_context.known: 我知道下周我需要做什么。
seed_context.target: I know how to do what I need to do next week.

practice_phrases: You know.
你知道。
If you know.
如果你知道。
She doesn't know yet.
她还不知道。
If you know how to say it.
如果你知道怎么说。
He doesn't know what I mean.
他不知道我的意思。
They know how to do interesting things.
他们知道怎么做有趣的事情。
If you know what I mean, it's a good thing.
如果你知道我的意思的话，是件好事。
She doesn't know how to say a few words to her friends.
她不知道怎么对朋友说几个词。
Because I think you know, I'm not trying to finish quickly.
因为我认为你知道，我不是在试着快速完成。
When I didn't sleep well last week, I don't know what to say.
上周当我没睡好的时候，我不知道说什么。

seed_context.known: 我知道下周我需要做什么。
seed_context.target: I know how to do what I need to do next week.

practice_phrases: Next week.
下周。
I know next week.
我知道下周。
Next week is interesting.
下周很有趣。
I enjoy next week.
我喜欢下周。
I'm trying to finish next week.
我试着下周完成。
Next week I want to do interesting things.
下周我想做有趣的事情。
I know what to say to my friends next week.
我知道下周对朋友说什么。
Next week I enjoy doing interesting things with my friends.
下周我喜欢和朋友做有趣的事情。
Because I think next week is a good thing, I don't care.
因为我认为下周是件好事，我不在乎。
I'm not trying to finish as quickly as possible next week.
我不是在试着下周尽快完成。

_instructions.task: Generate 12-15 practice phrases per LEGO using recent seed_pairs as pattern inspiration
_instructions.pattern_matching: Use recent_seed_pairs sentences as natural language pattern examples
_instructions.lego_coverage_requirement: Practice phrases MUST use at least 60% of the LEGOs listed in recent_seed_pairs[seed_id][1]
_instructions.vocabulary_source: Prioritize LEGOs from recent_seed_pairs[seed_id][1] + current_seed_legos_available, then any words from sentences
_instructions.overgeneration: Generate 12-15 phrases knowing some may be filtered by GATE validation
_instructions.quality: Semantic meaning + syntactic correctness + pedagogical value
_instructions.format: Array format: ["English phrase", "Spanish phrase", null, lego_count]
